title: Login Screen
body: Today which is oct 3 2016 i tried getting on league and after i put my password he keeps saying logging in and wont even say anything else plz fix this

replies.body:
It sounds like there may be some issues with your Internet Explorer security settings, which League relies on, or there could be connection issues to the server. As a first step, I recommend working through our [Login Issues guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761944-Login-Issues), where we've consolidated the most common solutions for this.

Let me know if those steps helped.
